events.name: Potential Russian Invasion of Ukraine
events.wd_description: Tensions rise as US President Joe Biden warns of a potential Russian invasion of Ukraine, with a build-up of Russian troops on the Ukrainian border and diplomatic efforts to de-escalate the situation.
events.description: Tensions rise as US President Joe Biden warns of a potential Russian invasion of Ukraine, with a build-up of Russian troops on the Ukrainian border and diplomatic efforts to de-escalate the situation.

events.name: US warnings
events.wd_description: US President Joe Biden and officials warn of a distinct possibility of a Russian invasion of Ukraine in February.
events.description: US President Joe Biden and officials warn of a distinct possibility of a Russian invasion of Ukraine in February.

events.name: t: Biden's statements
events.wd_description: President Biden warns of a potential Russian invasion during a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.
events.description: President Biden warns of a potential Russian invasion during a phone call with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky.

events.name: t: White House statement
events.wd_description: The White House issues a statement reaffirming the US's readiness to respond decisively if Russia invades Ukraine.
events.description: The White House issues a statement reaffirming the US's readiness to respond decisively if Russia invades Ukraine.

events.name: t: National Security Council spokesperson
events.wd_description: Emily Horne, spokesperson for the National Security Council, reiterates Biden's warning of a possible invasion.
events.description: Emily Horne, spokesperson for the National Security Council, reiterates Biden's warning of a possible invasion.

events.name: Russian troop build-up
events.wd_description: Tens of thousands of Russian troops are positioned on Ukraine's borders, raising fears of an imminent invasion.
events.description: Tens of thousands of Russian troops are positioned on Ukraine's borders, raising fears of an imminent invasion.

events.name: diplomatic efforts
events.wd_description: Diplomatic efforts are underway to de-escalate the situation, including talks between the US, Ukraine, and European leaders.
events.description: Diplomatic efforts are underway to de-escalate the situation, including talks between the US, Ukraine, and European leaders.

events.name: t: Biden-Zelensky call
events.wd_description: President Biden and President Zelensky discuss joint actions for the future and recent diplomatic efforts to de-escalate the crisis.
events.description: President Biden and President Zelensky discuss joint actions for the future and recent diplomatic efforts to de-escalate the crisis.

events.name: t: Macron-Putin call
events.wd_description: French President Emmanuel Macron is scheduled to speak with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss the crisis.
events.description: French President Emmanuel Macron is scheduled to speak with Russian President Vladimir Putin to discuss the crisis.

events.name: t: US-Russia negotiations
events.wd_description: Ongoing negotiations between the US and Russia, including the rejection of Russia's demand that Ukraine never join NATO.
events.description: Ongoing negotiations between the US and Russia, including the rejection of Russia's demand that Ukraine never join NATO.

events.name: energy implications
events.wd_description: The potential invasion has significant implications for energy projects, including the Nord Stream 2 pipeline from Russia to Germany.
events.description: The potential invasion has significant implications for energy projects, including the Nord Stream 2 pipeline from Russia to Germany.

events.name: t: Nord Stream 2 project
events.wd_description: The Nord Stream 2 pipeline, designed to double Russia's gas exports to Germany, faces potential sanctions if Russia invades Ukraine.
events.description: The Nord Stream 2 pipeline, designed to double Russia's gas exports to Germany, faces potential sanctions if Russia invades Ukraine.

events.name: t: potential sanctions
events.wd_description: Western allies, including the US and Germany, threaten to target Russia's economy and energy projects with sanctions if an invasion occurs.
events.description: Western allies, including the US and Germany, threaten to target Russia's economy and energy projects with sanctions if an invasion occurs.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai Impact in Madagascar
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai struck Madagascar, causing significant damage, displacing thousands, and killing at least ten people, while the country was still recovering from Cyclone Ana.

events.name: Cyclone Batsirai
events.wd_description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.
events.description: Cyclone Batsirai hit Madagascar's eastern shoreline, causing widespread destruction and displacing 43,000 people.

events.name: Displacement and Damage
events.wd_description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.
events.description: The cyclone killed at least ten people and displaced 43,000, with many towns and villages destroyed, and infrastructure severely impacted.

events.name: Emergency Response
events.wd_description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.
events.description: Emergency responders faced challenges accessing affected areas, while disaster relief agencies provided basic necessities to displaced individuals in temporary shelters.

events.name: Landslide in Petrópolis, Brazil
events.wd_description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.
events.description: A landslide triggered by heavy rains in Petrópolis, Brazil, resulted in 110 fatalities, with many still missing, and caused widespread destruction.

events.name: Landslide
events.wd_description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.
events.description: A wave of landslides caused by torrential rains led to massive casualties and destruction in the city of Petrópolis, with over 110 fatalities and 134 people still missing.

events.name: Search and Rescue Operations
events.wd_description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.
events.description: Search and rescue teams worked through sludge and debris, rescuing 24 people while 439 others lost their homes; the search for more survivors continues.

events.name: Government Response
events.wd_description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.
events.description: Brazil's President Jair Bolsonaro, who was abroad during the landslides, directed ministers to provide urgent aid and planned a visit to Petrópolis.

events.name: EU Batteries Regulation
events.wd_description: The EU's pending Batteries Regulation aims to set global standards for supply chain sustainability in the battery industry by addressing carbon intensity, environmental risks, and human rights abuses in the battery value chain.
events.description: The EU's pending Batteries Regulation aims to set global standards for supply chain sustainability in the battery industry by addressing carbon intensity, environmental risks, and human rights abuses in the battery value chain.

events.name: Regulation Overview
events.wd_description: The new Batteries Regulation proposes reductions to the carbon footprint of the battery value chain, mandatory levels of recycled content and recoverability for key raw materials, and requirements for battery performance, durability, safety, due diligence, and labeling.
events.description: The new Batteries Regulation proposes reductions to the carbon footprint of the battery value chain, mandatory levels of recycled content and recoverability for key raw materials, and requirements for battery performance, durability, safety, due diligence, and labeling.

events.name: t: Carbon Footprint Reductions
events.wd_description: The Regulation proposes progressive reductions to the carbon footprint of the battery value chain.
events.description: The Regulation proposes progressive reductions to the carbon footprint of the battery value chain.

events.name: t: Recycled Content and Recoverability
events.wd_description: The Regulation mandates minimum levels of recycled content and recoverability for key raw materials.
events.description: The Regulation mandates minimum levels of recycled content and recoverability for key raw materials.

events.name: t: Performance and Safety Requirements
events.wd_description: The Regulation includes additional requirements for battery performance, durability, safety, due diligence, and labeling.
events.description: The Regulation includes additional requirements for battery performance, durability, safety, due diligence, and labeling.

events.name: Stakeholder Engagement
events.wd_description: Significant stakeholder engagement around the Batteries Regulation highlights its potential impact and underscores differing responses to supply chain disruption between the EU and the United States.
events.description: Significant stakeholder engagement around the Batteries Regulation highlights its potential impact and underscores differing responses to supply chain disruption between the EU and the United States.

events.name: t: Engagement Impact
events.wd_description: The stakeholder engagement process underscores the sweeping potential impact of the Batteries Regulation.
events.description: The stakeholder engagement process underscores the sweeping potential impact of the Batteries Regulation.

events.name: t: Differences in US and EU Responses
events.wd_label: t: Differences in US and EU Responses
events.wd_description: The EU emphasizes quantifiable sustainability standards more than the US efforts to regulate battery sustainability, safety, and end-of-life management.
events.description: The EU emphasizes quantifiable sustainability standards more than the US efforts to regulate battery sustainability, safety, and end-of-life management.

events.name: Comparison with US Efforts
events.wd_description: The EU’s approach to regulating battery sustainability surpasses US efforts, which have been limited and fragmented, with only a few jurisdictions implementing Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) laws.
events.description: The EU’s approach to regulating battery sustainability surpasses US efforts, which have been limited and fragmented, with only a few jurisdictions implementing Extended Producer Responsibility (EPR) laws.

events.name: t: EU Regulations
events.wd_description: The EU has established comprehensive regulations for battery sustainability, including an EU-wide EPR directive for batteries.
events.description: The EU has established comprehensive regulations for battery sustainability, including an EU-wide EPR directive for batteries.

events.name: t: US Regulations
events.wd_description: The US has limited and fragmented regulations for battery sustainability, with only Washington, DC, and California implementing notable policies.
events.description: The US has limited and fragmented regulations for battery sustainability, with only Washington, DC, and California implementing notable policies.

events.name: Global Implications
events.wd_description: The Regulation's establishment of a battery passport to digitally track key metrics across the battery life cycle has global implications, pushing suppliers worldwide to transition to more sustainable business models.
events.description: The Regulation's establishment of a battery passport to digitally track key metrics across the battery life cycle has global implications, pushing suppliers worldwide to transition to more sustainable business models.

events.name: t: Battery Passport
events.wd_description: The Regulation establishes a battery passport to digitally track key metrics across the battery life cycle, from sourcing to end-of-life.
events.description: The Regulation establishes a battery passport to digitally track key metrics across the battery life cycle, from sourcing to end-of-life.

events.name: t: Compliance Requirements
events.wd_description: Suppliers operating across the battery value chain will need to transition to more sustainable business models to comply with the new requirements.
events.description: Suppliers operating across the battery value chain will need to transition to more sustainable business models to comply with the new requirements.

events.name: Challenges and Industry Response
events.wd_description: Challenges remain regarding the administration of penalties for noncompliance and balancing sustainability with economic competitiveness, but industry groups have generally responded positively to the regulation.
events.description: Challenges remain regarding the administration of penalties for noncompliance and balancing sustainability with economic competitiveness, but industry groups have generally responded positively to the regulation.

events.name: t: Penalty Administration Challenges
events.wd_description: Lawmakers must address how penalties for noncompliance will be administered and balance sustainability with economic competitiveness.
events.description: Lawmakers must address how penalties for noncompliance will be administered and balance sustainability with economic competitiveness.

events.name: t: Positive Industry Response
events.wd_description: Battery manufacturers, automakers, and energy companies have responded positively to the regulation, urging swift adoption and implementation.
events.description: Battery manufacturers, automakers, and energy companies have responded positively to the regulation, urging swift adoption and implementation.
